data.current_summary: Get Business Units for a user
data.current_description: Get Business Units identified by `userId`. The `userId` refers to the user's ID.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve Business Units associated with user
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all Business Units associated with a specific user identified by their `userId`. Returns a collection of Business Unit objects containing unit information and logo metadata. This operation is useful for determining which Business Units a user has access to or is affiliated with.
